subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Up to 5x more usage for GPT-4o compared to free users, plus higher limits for GPT-4o with advanced data analysis and file uploads.
Included with usage caps under the ChatGPT Plus subscription.
5x more usage than the free tier, with a higher cap for using Claude 3.5 Sonnet and access to Projects feature.
Included with higher usage limits under the Claude Pro subscription.
Access via Google One AI Premium; no explicit token limit, but usage is subject to fair use policies.
Available in AI Studio and via API; subscription gives access to the more capable Pro/Ultra model.

llama_3_8b_instruct.note: Model is open-source. Pricing is for managed API via a third-party cloud provider (e.g., AWS Bedrock, Google Cloud Vertex AI). Costs are for hosting/inference, not the model itself.

llama_3_70b_instruct.note: Model is open-source. Pricing is for managed API via a third-party cloud provider.

subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: For individuals; full access to Copilot in Office apps, priority access to latest models, and faster performance.
For enterprise; per-user, per-month fee. Integrated with enterprise data and Microsoft Graph.

deepseek_chat.note: Offers a 50% discount on input tokens that are part of a long context cache.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High and growing rapidly. The $20/month tier has become the market standard for premium consumer access.
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price compression in 2024, with new models like GPT-4o, DeepSeek, and Qwen-Max setting new low-cost benchmarks for high capability. The introduction of context caching (Anthropic, DeepSeek) is a new major lever for reducing costs on long-context tasks.
